IntroContent.title: Snacc It!
IntroContent.text: Elevate your health with Snacc. Capture a meal, get instant nutritional insights. For everyone committed to a healthier tomorrow.

MiddleBlockContent.title: Revolutionizing Nutrition Tracking
MiddleBlockContent.text: Snacc redefines meal tracking: AI-powered analysis, user-friendly design. Perfect for individuals and professionals.

MissionContent.title: Personalized For Your Health Goals
MissionContent.text: With Snacc, tailor your nutrition and fitness journey with ease. Achieve your goals with our custom insights.

ProductContent.title: Simplicity Meets Innovation
ProductContent.text: Snacc combines intuitive design with cutting-edge AI, making nutrition tracking and management seamless. Ideal for everyone from fitness enthusiasts tracking macros to healthcare professionals overseeing patient nutrition.
